DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether insulin glulisine effective postprandial glycemic control insulin aspart H-GI meal child type 1 diabetes ( T1DM ) treat insulin pump ( CSII ) .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Glulisine Aspart Postprandial Glycemic Control After High-GI Meal Children With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: Some study suggest insulin glulisine ( GLU ) slightly faster onset action compare insulin aspart ( ASP ) . Meals high glycemic index ( H-GI ) distinct effect postprandial glycaemia ( PPG ) .
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus CSII least 3 month Duration diabetes > 1 year Informed consent Concomitant dietary restriction ( e.g . celiac disease food allergy ) Diabetes related complication Baseline hyperglycemia > 150 mg/dl Any disease judge investigator affect trial
